content:
# I have successfully harvested 20 stone, and my inventory now contains both coal and stone. 
# Now I can proceed to craft the Stone Furnace.

# Step 6: Craft the Stone Furnace
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Craft one Stone Furnace

# After crafting, I will check my inventory to confirm that the Stone Furnace has been added.
print(f"Inventory after crafting: {inspect_inventory()}")
